Package ohos.data.rdb

Class RdbOpenCallback

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.data.rdb.RdbOpenCallback

  • public abstract class RdbOpenCallback
extends Object
    Manages database creation, upgrade, and downgrade.

    You can create a child class to implement the #onCreate, #onUpgrade, or #onOpen method. If a database already exists, it will be opened; if no database exists, a database will be created. During database upgrade, the methods of this class are also called.

    Since:
    1
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Data#DATA_APPDATAMGR

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        public abstract void onCreate​(RdbStore store)
        Called when the database associated with an RDB store is created.

        This method creates a database and inserts initialized table data into the database.

        Parameters:
        store - Indicates the RdbStore object.
        Since:
        1

      • onUpgrade

        public abstract void onUpgrade​(RdbStore store,
                               int currentVersion,
                               int targetVersion)
        Called when the database associated with an RDB store needs to be upgraded.

        This method is executed in a transaction. If an exception is thrown, all changes will be automatically rolled back.

        Parameters:
        store - Indicates the RdbStore object.
        currentVersion - Indicates the current database version.
        targetVersion - Indicates the target database version.
        Since:
        1

      • onDowngrade

        public void onDowngrade​(RdbStore store,
                        int currentVersion,
                        int targetVersion)
        Called when the database associated with this RdbStore needs to be downgraded.

        This method is executed in a transaction. If an exception is thrown, all changes will be automatically rolled back.

        Parameters:
        store - Indicates the RdbStore object.
        currentVersion - Indicates the current database version.
        targetVersion - Indicates the target database version.
        Since:
        1

        Parameters:

      • onCorruption

        public void onCorruption​(File databaseFile)
        Called when a corruption exception occurs when the database is opened.
        Parameters:
        databaseFile - the file representing the database on which corruption is detected.
        Since:
        4
